name: Mine Savior
description:
Your men are stuck in a minefield with German Soldiers advancing on you. you must move forward to escape. Inspired by the minefield scene from Kelly's heroes you have control over 5 soldiers who must make their way towards the minefield edge where they can escape into safety.  Controls are that of a turn based so left click units to select and click to move, right click to scan a tile. Green means safe and no mine, Yellow is a tile you haven't scan yet, and Red means there's a mine there. The red button on the right ends your turn while the blue bottom restarts the game.
